summary: This document is a daily lieutenant's log from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, NY, covering three shifts on July 27, 2019. It records routine prison operations, counts, and security checks, with specific notes that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was on psychological observation with an inmate companion. The log also notes other inmates at hospitals and that the fire alarm system was inoperable.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on psychological observation with an inmate companion on July 27, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The prison's fire alarm and sprinkler system were inoperable, requiring a manual fire watch.
Other inmates, Melendez and Burnett, were noted as being at external medical facilities (hospital and nursing home) with USMS guards or institutional staff.
The log shows routine prison operations including multiple inmate counts, body alarm tests, and equipment checks.
This log documents prison conditions approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
